name: Sparkle Unleashed
description: Sparkle Unleashed is a wonderfully polished casual action puzzle game. Match like colored orbs before they fall into the abyss, unlock earthshaking powerups, and conquer more than a 100 levels! Carve a path of light through an enchanting world of mystery and magic!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
